title: The Papers: 'Rebellion' on NI Brexit deal and gas at 18-month low
description: Rishi Sunak faces objections to plans for EU deal and energy prices in Europe have fallen dramatically.

title: Women's T20 World Cup: Ireland out of the T20 World Cup after penultimate-ball defeat

title: Cardiff City 1-0 Reading: Romaine Sawyers fires stoppage-time winner for Bluebirds
description: Cardiff City's mini-revival under new boss Sabri Lamouchi continues with a stoppage-time win over Reading in the Championship.

title: Amazon calls staff back to office three days a week
description: The firm joins a slew of other companies that are tightening remote work rules.

title: Women's T20 World Cup: Hayley Matthews saves West Indies from defeat

title: University strikes: UCU action paused over seven days
description: The union said it had made "significant progress" across multiple issues during talks with employers.

description: The comments were made as seven Just Stop Oil members were sentenced for targeting a fuel terminal.

title: Women's T20 World Cup: West Indies keep semi-final hopes alive with win

title: Bruce Willis has frontotemporal dementia - what is it?
